sentences.en: ‘What’s your relationship to Sue?’ ‘She’s my cousin.’
sentences.cn: “你和休是什么关系？”“她是我的表姐。”

sentences.en: A good relationship involves concern and sensitivity for each other's feelings.
sentences.cn: 一段美满的恋情需要彼此关心并体恤对方的情感。

sentences.en: A good relationship is built on trust.
sentences.cn: 一种好的关系是以信任为基础的。

sentences.en: Every relationship has a lot of ups and downs.
sentences.cn: 每一段感情都有许多起伏。

sentences.en: He’s never had a sexual relationship before.
sentences.cn: 他以前从未与人有过性关系。

sentences.en: His new relationship with Germany is enshrined in a new non-aggression treaty.
sentences.cn: 他与德国的新关系受新的互不侵犯条约的保护。

sentences.en: His relationship with Mary went through four stages.
sentences.cn: 他与玛丽的关系经历了四个阶段。

sentences.en: How much emotional baggage is he bringing with him into the relationship?
sentences.cn: 他背负着多重的感情包袱开始这段恋情？

sentences.en: I have quite a good relationship with my parents.
sentences.cn: 我和父母关系很好。

sentences.en: In a strange way, his affair caused our relationship to strengthen.
sentences.cn: 奇怪的是，他的婚外恋倒使我们之间的关系更加紧密了。

sentences.en: In our country there is an adversarial relationship between government and business.
sentences.cn: 在我国，官商之间存在一种对立关系。

sentences.en: It was a bad start in my relationship with Warr.
sentences.cn: 我与沃尔的关系开始得不太顺利。

sentences.en: One in eight women lives in an abusive relationship.
sentences.cn: 每八位女性中就有一位遭受伴侣的虐待。

sentences.en: The crisis could well place the relationship at risk.
sentences.cn: 这场危机可能会使这一关系有破裂的危险。

sentences.en: the relationship between diet and health problems
sentences.cn: 膳食与健康问题之间的联系

sentences.en: The vice-president seems to have a good working relationship with the president.
sentences.cn: 副总统似乎与总统有着良好的工作关系。

sentences.en: Their first exchange set the tone for a new relationship.
sentences.cn: 他们初步交换意见， 为建立新关系定了调子。

sentences.en: Their relationship is never short on fun and frolic.
sentences.cn: 他们在一起少不了欢乐和嬉戏。

sentences.en: There is an uneasy relationship between us and the politicians.
sentences.cn: 我们和那些政治家之间的关系很不稳固。

sentences.en: They decided to put their relationship on a more formal footing.
sentences.cn: 他们决定正式交往。

sentences.en: Wanting fidelity implies you're thinking about a major relationship.
sentences.cn: 要求忠诚意味着你想发展一段严肃认真的恋爱关系。

sentences.en: Whenever I get into a relationship, I always fall madly in love.
sentences.cn: 我每次谈恋爱都深陷其中，无法自拔。

words.tran_cn: 有关系的，有关联的；讲述的，叙述的
相对的；有关系的；成比例的
关系；叙述；故事；亲属关系
亲戚；相关物；[语] 关系词；亲缘植物
涉及；认同；符合；与…有某种联系

trans.tran_cn: 关系，恋爱关系，血缘关系
trans.tran_en: the way in which two people or two groups feel about each other and behave towards each other
